title: Mizrahi Jews
summary: Mizrahi Jews (Hebrew: יהודי המִזְרָח‎) or Mizrahim (מִזְרָחִים), also sometimes referred to as Mizrachi (מִזְרָחִי), Edot HaMizrach (עֲדוֹת-הַמִּזְרָח; transl. '[Jewish] Communities of the [Middle] East') or Oriental Jews,[11] are the descendants of the local Jewish communities that had existed in Western Asia and North Africa from Biblical times into the modern era.
